data.text: Is this a kind act or an unkind act? Click the correct answer.
data.option: Talal shared his lunch with Bilal who had forgotten his own.
Vijay helped his teacher to carry a stack of books.
Fatima told her mother that she could not help her in the kitchen because she was playing a game.
Arif was upset with his brother and pushed him.
Jenny found a stray cat that had lost its mother. She gave it some milk.
Maha invited all the girls in her class to her birthday, except one.
Rehan was walking along a path when he tripped and fell. The group standing nearby started laughing.
Tanya saw a poor girl as she was buying ice cream. She returned it to buy two ice lollies. She gave one to the poor girl.
